[[Image:Med 3.png]] [[1998 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|1998]]|h_pattern_b=_thinsidesonwhite|h_body=E30A17|h_shorts=E30A17|h_pattern_s=_blanksides2 |a_pattern_b=_thinwhitesides|a_body=E30A17|a_shorts=E30A17|a_pattern_s=_whitesides }} The '''Turkish Under 20 and Under 21 national basketball team''' (Turkish Young Men national basketball team), ('''{{lang-tr|Ãmit Milli Basketbol TakÄ±mÄ±}}''') is the representative for [[Turkey]] in international [[basketball]] competitions, and it is organized and run by the [[Turkish Basketball Federation]]. The '''Turkish Under 20 national basketball team''' represents Turkey at the [[FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship]] and the '''Turkish Under 21 national basketball team''' at the [[FIBA Under-21 World
